question: Which city is hosting the 2017 Global Rajasthan Agritech Meet (GRAM)?
explanation: The 2017 Global Rajasthan Agritech Meet (GRAM) has started at Kota, Rajasthan from May 24, 2017 to empower farmers with latest technical know-how and best practices. Malaysia is the partner country in the GRAM Kota 2017. The GRAM will provide a platform for Agri-firms to promote themselves and/or find promoters. The 3-day event will bring all stakeholders- farmers from in and around Kota, academicians, technologists, agribusiness companies and policy makers â€“ to accelerate development of sustainable agricultural and allied activities through innovative methods and best practices.
